moves.1. e4 Nf6: My oppenent decides to start the day with the Alekhine's...
moves.2. e5 Nd5 3. d4 d6 4. Bc4 c6: ...gone wrong, I was not expecting that move, is there some line like that that I don't know of?
moves.5. Bxd5 cxd5 6. Nf3: I think Nf3 was a little slow on my part, better probably would have been Qf3.
moves.6... dxe5 7. dxe5 Nd7: What??????? He's gives me a pawn and allows me to get my queen out, are you kidding me?
moves.9... fxe6 10. Qxe6: ...now that is one heck of a queen!
moves.10... Nc5 11. Qc4: Backed up a little too far, Qe5 was much better here.
moves.11... b6 12. Be3 Bg7 13. Bxc5: Does he actually think I'm going to let him get away with Bxb2?
moves.14. Qb5+: Oops! Looks like he's in trouble know.
moves.14... Bd7 15. Qxb2 bxc5: He spent about 2 or 3 seconds on this move.
moves.16. Qxh8+ Kf7 17. Ng5#: If this checkmate does not have a name I'm calling it Tavernier's mate.
